structure.unit: ACQUISITION AND DEVELOPMENT OF PUBLIC PROJECTS THROUGH REVENUE BONDS

law.catch_line: Use of facilities for events other than horse racing.
law.text: The authority may also conduct or permit the conduct of other athletic and entertainment events at Churchill Downs and the use of its facilities in connection therewith, provided such activities or events do not conflict with or impinge upon the proper operation thereof primarily as a racetrack.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 4, effective June 17, 1978.
